question: [Explain] Italiano: Riporta which integer bin occurs most frequently dal istogramma.

qas.question: [Explain] Italiano: Riporta which integer bin occurs most frequently dal istogramma.
[Practice] Francais: Indiquez how many samples were used in total a partir de l'histogramme.
[Calm] English: State how many entries fall inside the modal bin based on the histogram.
